featured.text: Its soft inner part is often discarded.
It represents a third, or inner eye.
For one thing, only the husk of the cactus is used for generating biofuel, while its inner flesh is still preserved for food.
Over the years, only the edible soft inner flesh has been used.

definition.zh_def: 內部的，內心的，或與內部有關的。
definition.en_def: Situated inside; internal or relating to the inner part.
definition.example: She found peace in her inner thoughts.
